name: Dyslexia 失读症
description:
This is a Demo for the serious game Dyslexia.

--------

In China, the prevalence of Dyslexia ranges from 3% to 10%. 

Unfortunately, most teachers or parents from China did not know about Dyslexia, even though it has been studied domestically for more than a decade.

There is still no effective methodology for treating Dyslexia in the Chinese Language nowadays.

This game aims at raising public awareness for dyslexia people.
